/* strtok example */
	#include <stdio.h>
	#include <string.h>
	int main ()
	{
	  char str[] =""- This, a sample string."";
	  char * pch;
	  printf (""Splitting string \""%s\"" into tokens:\n"",str);
	  pch = strtok (str,"" ,.-"");
	  while (pch != NULL)
	  {
		printf (""%s\n"",pch);
		pch = strtok (NULL, "" ,.-"");
	  }
	  return 0;
	}
